Blog.post: I hope you guys can read this, I just wanted to say that the WASL, was A LOT easier than I thought. So it's ok. Everyone was all making a big deal about it. Maybe the second half is harder we have 3 periods straight taking it. So now we have another 3.

Ugh my throat hurts. After we went swimming me Dawn, and Ian went for pizza, then we came home and watched a movie. And finally he went home and here I am. You all know Dawn in my sister right? Just for those who don't know.....I was gonna bring Michelle too but she forgot. Then I was gonna bring Carli, but I didn't give her enough notice. Soooo yeah. AND I have a dance this Friday, the last one with the 7th and 8th graders combined. Then we have one just 8th graders at the high school. Woo the theme for the dance is like....A night in Paradise. Maybe I should wear a turban and a toga. Lol, that would be interesting. I need to think of some songs to put down on my cd, but every time I ask someone they say songs I already have....DAMN YOU PEOPLE I HAVE ASKED!! Well I'm gonna go look for some more songs I like. Lata playas

Oook Well I'm in class it's 5th period It's gonna be lunch in 11 minutes. And I'm kinda going back and forth between working and goofing off. No one minds though. I have Jazz combo today after I eat lunch which is when I go in for my lunch break and play music with some other select players. I think I'm gonna join the talent show and play Jazz Improv. On my clarinet. It should be fun. I wonder if I'll be able to do it.....oh well! Well I'm gonna go, lata playas

Argh! For some reason some of my posts aren't coming up, so either they're showing up on yours or on no one's I hope Y'all read the ones before.....Sooo yeah. *gasp* I waved to you-know-who....I forgot his name, but I was really waving to Carli, it just looked like I was waving to him lol and he waved back like a joke and I gave him a really weird look and he started laughing. So at least now he knows who I am. I think I'm gonna drop the crush and persue my real dream....=D they know who they are, and I don't even know if they're reading this lately. Soo yeah. Anywho I'm gonna go watch a movie, catch ya lata playas/playettes

Ugh I'm in such a bad mood. I think I'm gonna die because everything is bugging me. I need to like....go to sleep and vent on someone. But it's so damn hot in here. It's like 79-81 degrees F. Ugh....I've been sucking and rubbing ice cubes on me all day. I kept spelling "cubes" "cubs" too. Lol. I think everyone knew and didn't correct me. Oh well I think I'm gonna go lie down. Lata playas

Oook I'm running out of colors. I don't even know if this is a real color! Oh well it should still show up.....I hope. I'm in the library since I forgot money for lunch....so hungry..... Well nothings going down here there's only two people in here....make that three. Ok four. And there's another class in a seperate room.....They're 7th graders. I never got to go in there for MY communication classes.....How unfair. Well it was also a different teacher. Since I'm in band, Jazz band and AVID, I can't be in social studies or an encore class. Since you only get two. Which is why I don't have social studies. Well I have WASL testing on thursay and friday (Washington Assesment Student Learning) Ugh....It's the science WASL, I'm gonna crash and burn on it. My math teacher was going to show us a copy of the 10th grade WASL, but someone was talking........I'm not saying who....*cough* George *cough*. Oh sorry, I think I'm coming down with something....:D Well I gotta go. ^_^

Everyone is calling me today but my favorite person, I guess their basic phone service went out lol oh well. I went swimming today...I had a ball. Only since I couldn't find my bathing suit, I had to wear a sleevless T and some shorts....and the shirt was white and you could see right through it! Good thing I wore a sports bra underneath....phew. We weren't the only people there though.....and I brought some friends. *sigh* they couldn't stop laughing....until I made them lol, j/k. Well it's time for dinner! Peace y'all, luv yas ^_^

Oh no...One of my friends crushes found she likes him, she's crushed! I feel so bad for her, but I can't get her to vent out on me. She knows I'm there for her....Maybe she just needs to be alone for a while.

Hey Y'all, I'm at school and as you guessed...I have nothing better to do than to write here. Ain't I interestin'? Oh I know. Well I'm actually on my lunch break. And the 7th graders are in the library also....boy are they noisey. But the one I 'kinda' like is in here. The one I like because they remind me of someone I really really like. Ya know? Am I the only one in the world that does this.....Ah well, it's only looks-wise, I don't even know the guy....I'm weird huh? Well I'm gonna go do other things.....Bye!

Yesterday was awesome! I had such a good time! I downloaded X-Chat and it was actually pretty cool...kinda confusing but still pretty cool. And I got AIM, Yahoo messenger, and MSN messenger onto the computer. So it's all good. I have everything I need....NOw let's just pray that I don't get a virus or I don't get hacked or somethin like that. Well.....toodles!

*sigh* This computer sucks. Spyware sucks, viruses suck. The only thing that doesn't suck is Msn messenger, AIM, Yahoo Messenger, Blogger and umm that's it. I think....not sure yet. Oh yeah, FFR, and E-messenger. That's it. That's all you need. PERIOD. Well That's all I have to say. Bye!

Well ummm I have NOTHING to write here......just thought I'd tell you that. I never do. Ummm yeah.....*blink* CRAP! I have math homework to do.....but it's really easy. Review of ditributive property...so it's all good.....well I better get to work on that....soon....not now....but definitly before it's due.....= \ I hope.

Oy it's the weekand!! Yay!! ^_^ I'm soooo happy I have a full weekand, I'm gonna have a sleepover at Amie's and Becca's house, and if I can't I will next weekand, then I'm going to the movies with Erik, and finally going to play pool with my mom ^_^ We go every other weekand, I beat her twice last time (FINALLY) the first time I won on my own, but the second.....we switched balls lol. Well I'm gonna go talk to Nick...........uh huh.........weird..........*types* ok he had to go lol. Well.....bye =)

*sigh* well it's friday, I'm at lunch and I have about 10 minutes to write this. My next class is Jazz band but in Concert Band our director (Ms. McFeely) Gave up and said she was done for the day....and we waited in class for the last 5-10 minutes waiting for the bell to ring.....It was scary. Now I'm kinda scared to go back =S. Well....Wish me luck!
Btw Astricks or whatever they're called the little star thingys (*) By a name mean it's been changed for mine or someone elses convinence, thank ya ^_^ See ya lata

Omg.....Dude I know no one's reading this but this crazy guy keeps walking past my house and throwing his hands in the air like he's worshiping god and maybe he is...in some freaked out way I dunno, and like he's acting like there's snakes all over him or somethin....I dunno it's weird....Just HAD to write it somewhere. Well *yawn* I'm going to bed....not that any of you care ^_^ Peace

Oy, today was harsh, the days go by soooo slooow when it's close to summer. Jeez....two more months exactly in 4 days. I don't know if I can last! =( Language Arts Well we didn't do anything in that class what really went down was passing time (the time I get to go from one class to the next) Language Arts to Math Passing Time (4 minutes after class ends) Well I saw Andrew* and Josh*. Krista likes Josh * and I kinda like Andrew*, But I only like Andrew* because he reminds me of someone else I really like....only in looks. I don't even really know Andrew* = \ Weird huh? Math We took notes on this whole other theory, irrational numbers, which we've talked about but havn't really looked into. And I finally understand what they really ARE. And we got a really long homework assignment. 6-26 even numbers only. and we have a review sheet. We actually learned all this stuff last year. Mr. Roberts is just trying to get us ready for high school. Passing Time Math to Science (4 min.) I saw Anndrew again, but he didn't see me. I saw Krista look at Josh* too, it's kinda funny when she asks me all about him, when I really have no clue who he really is. Odd I know. Science God this class is boring, well not really boring, the teacher just makes it boring his name is Mr. Moore btw (A.K.A Mr. Snooore) we're just filling out the blanks in worksheets and he's giving us the answers. But me and Krista actually just wrote notes back in forth since we sit next to each other every day. The notes were mainly about "Who likes Krista" "who Krista should go to the dance with" "What she should do" And I give her a lot of advice, which is weird, since I need to listen to the advice I'm giving, so I won't make fun of her if she can't do anything about her crush, since I wouldn't be able to do anything about mine. But I can talk to her crushes just fine....maybe she could talk to mine. Maaaaybe not, I don't think I want them talking to Krista, I'm a very possessive person. Passing time from Science to Concert Band Lol I said hi to Austin, who is a seventh grader that Krista knows, and I only know his name because we went to the same elementry school, only....he doesn't know mine lol, so I just mess with him ^_^ Quite fun really. Concert Band We got a new piece and she can't decide between these two pieces one is called Quintero the other is like.....Shining of the Stars or something....I like Quintero better because I like playing in 5/4 time. Passing time from Concert Band to AVID Well nothing really happened here, I said hi to Krista, Carli, Kelli, Ian and some others that I saw. But that's about it AVID We had a guest speaker today. A congress man for our district, He was kinda cool, and I was a panel person (there was like 10 people out of the class that actually got to talk to him...all hand-picked) Which reminds me, I have to write a thank you letter to him. He talked to me after class, he congragulated me on something only I don't really know what it is....ah well. Lunch I tried to eat fast and get to the library and meet Krista and Alisha, we were using the computers together to check our e-mail. We wrote back and forth for a while until 5 minutes before the bell, when we went outside and waited for Ryan to come out, Only when he did, it didn't go according to plan, so we'll probably do it tomorrow. Jazz Band Ohhh this was really fun, we started all new stuff, we got two new songs, One is like Pamalaya. the other is......Pink Panther! Which we begged her to get. WOoOoOo, after that we worked it out, but I had to switch with the other Tenor Sax player (Michelle) Because she can't play the "low notes" see, I had the first part, but she took it. Oh well I still have a cool part either way, so it's cool. Passing time from Jazz Band to P.E Oy nothing happened here, I just....walked to the gym lol. P.E All we did here was another pacer test (last of the year!! WOoo) I beat my old score, Krista beat her brother,and ummm Becca and Amie are totally awesome, they seem to think i'm the funniest person on the planet....weird....well i'm done woooo

Wooo I'm not going to school today! I'm supposed to go on this field trip to WWU (Western Washington University) But I told my mom I don't want to go. Even though I don't have choice since I forgot to turn in my rough draft and I can't go anyhew. Oh well....At least I'll get to stay home and sleep in.....Wooo! Well I'm going back to bed, night!

urlLink I am Edea! Selfless and stong-willed, I have the ability to do a lot of good. Luckily for the world, that's usually my intention. If I were ever corrupted by evil, you would all be in serious trouble. On top of all that, I'm pretty sexy. urlLink Take the Final Fantasy 8 Test here! My #1 result for the SelectSmart.com selector, urlLink Your Real Estate Match in Middle Earth , is Lorien

Ugh, my stomach hurts, I'm on this new thing with my friends so they aren't left out.....lol stupid friends....I'm just gonna cheat behind their backs....lol no. Anyway..... have two things to put in here, one another poem, and two a comment....first the comment....: You know what I hate (and this is strictly for girls) I hate it when guys don't get the hint.....because after they don't you just can't say it....so it sucks. Maybe I need to change my ways.... Now....for the poem....: SISTERS We've been through a lot We're sisters til the end Sticking together, through thick and thin We'll take care of each other Watch each others backs We'll take it head on And conqur any task We're sisters and I'm proud To have you next to me To stay next to you And feel safe, snug and sound Okie dokie, I'm done, later!

I havn't posted anything in a long time...haha I got in a fight with Kirsta's brother. He's a huge butthole....but forget him. There really isn't anything I can put here since only like......3 or maybe 4 people are reading this site. But you know what....that's ok because I can vent here. AHH! I lost my Personal Dragon Rough Draft, and I have a rough draft due on the 18th...and I havn't even started. And internet explorer keeps freezing....and they're so much better than me :'( and I'll never be that good...and I miss her....and I miss him a lot....and I don't want to cry but it's to late because I'm so confusing and no one knows what I'm talking about because I'm not explaining anything....but it's ok.....because I still have music....it'll get me through. Ok well bye.

I write the weirdest stuff when I'm alone.....check this out Death is better than this feeling Why won't someone tell me what's going on I'm to young to feel this way I need help I'm scared and all alone Help Why aren't you helping me? Please.... I could write forever and it wouldn't mean anything to anyone but me. Love hurts They say it's not supposed to be painful but it stings..... True love is not real Not anymore It died along with the GOOD expectations of looks and old fashion ways everything has changed nothing is the same Woo all done. See ya guys later!

Gah it's like 1:47 AM and I can't sleep. I know why but......I don't know how to change it. Tch and I'm having an allergy attack. Oy......and it's so hot......and someone is gonna cook! I won't be able to sleep.....I better go now.....lata playas

Woo School's almost out, Thursday's my last full day then I have my "graduation" on Friday. It's just from middle school to high school...nothin' big. Ah well! We shall see....your guy's comments (not that you leave any) should be how you would sign my yearbook....keep up the good work!

I just finished reading Abhorsen (last of it's trilogy) And I have to say....Sabriel, Lirael, and Abhorsen are my all time favorite books. *sigh* I'm kinda bummed out that I've read them and they're over....I'll have to read them again sometime. Which reminds me...I still havn't finished Eragon....I'd like to sometime. But I'll have to get the book from somewhere. I liked that book quite a lot too. Anyway....that's all I have to write for now. Catch ya all later. Peace =P

Dude...they made this a lot easier, lol. I really didn't need it like this but it's a lot better. In case you guys didn't know what I was talking about, they now have a drop box for fonts and colors. Instead of having to enter the tags and stuff...And now you can enter pictures directly from your thingy instead of going through an ftp. Which...I think you had to do, but I'm not entirely sure.

Ahh yes, Halle's new movie. Not much to say about it. It was just a side thought about the woman's outfit. It just looks like it would be....difficult...to take off and put on. Whatddya think? Well just send feedback and I'll see what ya think. Later

urlLink SelectSmart.com Lord of the Rings Selectors Quizzes Tests Decision Makers Select Quiz Test These are actually quite fun, there isn't a lot of spam , and they're tons of catagories. Two thumbs up on this one if you get super bored, and if that isn't enough there's always http://www.bored.com Which includes various activites including prank e-mails to send to your friends (which is loads of fun :D) Well, that's all I have now, later!
urlLink Welcome to Neopets! This site is kind of childish, and very unrealistic, it's fun for a while but grows old very fast. The whole plot isn't very intriging, but you get the point.....

*sigh* yes, I made another one. This blog is all about teen ideas (just like the other one Teenage View) only this one is for less serious subjects that won't cause as much contreversy ;) Enjoy! And please send back some feedback! Thank you =D

I HIGHLY reccomend these books if you're into realism and fantasy. It had magic but it's so well written you'd believe it =P They're very enjoyable and definetly page-turners. Check 'em out and have a blast!!

Aaaall right. There's some picture going around with Joel and Hilary Duff kissing and etc. Even thought it might be a publisity stunt. The word is that they're going out. Which is very very wrong since they're about 9 years seperated. Sooo any comments? Pleeeease give me some feedback. Thank you ^_^

Actually I usually don't reccomend other bands....but this one's rather interesting. I've only heard one song, "Only for the Weak". And I'm not much of a fan of the vocals. But everything else rocks. Check it out. *one 1/2 thumbs up*
